posts.post_content:
Up for your consideration are two T206 beaters. The price will be $19SOLD (for the pair) if you use Paypal FF and are okay with me shipping the cards in a plain white envelope (and you trust the USPS to deliver that envelope). That said, you can add $4 if you want a tracking number and want to use the regular Paypal option.

Cards are in poor/trimmed shape.

Cards will be available until I post that they have been sold. I'm super quick with updating my for sale posts.

I have plenty of good trading and selling references if needed.

Thanks!
David

[IMG]https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-i59A6G1pblA/Wm-tEsVNOhI/AAAAAAAABes/lAt0KUfNi786ZGl5kPFWr0QPUnhnR7EJQCLcBGAs/s1600/IMG_1975.JPG[/IMG]

[IMG]https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-r1MuyOCAqsw/Wm-tEuCGIVI/AAAAAAAABew/8AIIIcvQ_W4cy7jUFAC3EWe7sBjbWMllgCLcBGAs/s1600/IMG_1976.JPG[/IMG]

Sorry. The $19 shipped price is only for USA addresses. I don't want to anger our neighbors up north but I'm trying to keep prices down for everyone and it will cost a bit more to ship to outside the states. Cards are waiting for a good home..
